root.name: Heracles: Chariot Racing
root.description: Heracles: Chariot Racing is a racing game that originally came out for PS2 on July 6th, 2007 but then later was rereleased as a WiiWare game on July 6th, 2009. The game is based completely off Greek mythology. The game allows you to play as a number of characters from Greek mythology such as Heracles, Poseidon, Medusa, and Minotaur. You race in a series of chariot races with the goal of being crowned Champion Charioteer.
